title: SATYA SALUJA LITERACY FOUNDATION
detailsOfAchievement: Satya Saluja Literacy Foundations initiative Virohan Institute of Allied Health and Management Sciences is an organization to promote: (a) Access to Education, (b) Gender Equality, (c) Inclusive Growth and (d) Improved Healthcare. Virohan Institute provides education and training to youth and women for employment in Healthcare, Automobile and IT-ITes sector. Since its launch in September 2015, the organization has grown to employ a staff of 50, and has reached at least 35 peri-urban or rural communities with a population of 500,000 people in Haryana and Delhi-NCR. The Foundations work begins with reaching out to the communities and mobilizing women and youth towards an accessible education which will lead to employment and empowerments. For this Virohan Institute organizes health camps and school outreach, or leverages existing platforms such as ASHA or Anganwadi workers. The students are trained a comprehensive skill development using an exclusive CLIP program focused on: Core medical knowledge, Laboratory training, Individual development, and Practical training. Virohan Institute and Satya Saluja Foundation through its partnerships with industry leading Industries also facilitates employment or entrepreneurship opportunities for graduating students. By providing quality and standardized training to its students. Virohan Institute ensures improved services. There has been a consistently positive feedback from industry assessors on the quality of teaching, facilities provided, and student overall development at Virohan Institute. Key Achievements of SSLF:  SSLF institute Virohan has trained 500 candidates in 18 courses pertaining to allied healthcare sector  As an implementing of NSDCs UDAAN Schemes for Jammu & Kashmir, SSLF trained 30 candidates for the job roles of Sales executive and desktop publishing.  Its affiliate TCS and Associates Private Limited (TCSAPL) successfully trained over 3000 people in the last 10 years by developing their Software Skills, Management Skills, Entrepreneurship Skills, Automobile Industrial Skills, etc.  SSLF is implementing NSDCs skill development program with a mandate to train 22000 candidates in seven years for various sectoral job roles  SSLFs affiliate TCS is already running a motor driving school at it centre in Faridabad where it already trained 2000 candidates in last 3 years.

detailsOfAchievement: SEVADHARAM PATIENT CARE SOCIETY H.NO- 1244, SEC 28, Hanuman Mandir, Petrol Pump Road Faridabad Haryana Activity Report for the Year 2010-2011 Sevadharam patient care society (regd.) is an ISO 9001:2008 certified organization serving the needy patients in the Delhi NCR region. The organization was registered under society Registration Act 1960.on9th Sept.2010. ISO 9001:2008 Certificate was also obtained on 6th June 2010, and HR Govt. Regd. No. 136 on 09.09.2010. The society provides nurse & attendant for patient very successfully and efficiently. A part from this, Health care equipment ambulance, and mobile mortuary services are also provided to the patients. Our aim is to render selfless services to the patients for granting them utmost relief from their ailments. SEVADHARAM PATIENT CARE SOCIETY (regd.) is a Faridabad (Haryana) based organization working in the field of patient care. It was established in the year 2008. Mr. Awadhesh Kumar Bajpai is the CEO of the organization with 15 year of experience in the in medical services. He has been the inspiriting figure behind the selfless services render to the patients. Resources Keeping the critical aspect of patient care services. We have well organized resources making us a reliable destination for claiming healthcare services. We have highly advanced medical accessories and equipment in our inventory. Besides, we also have ambulance and mobile mortuary which can be availed all the time. Trained Staff We core strength lies in our well trained and qualified staff. We have the services of skilled nurses, stewards, and other medical professional committed to serve the patients. Our medical staff is sensitive, polite and compassionate with a Knack of serving humanity we are provided the services to about 500 patients. Services Available our services are available in the whole region of Delhi and NCR. Our services are available 24 X 7 for the care of ailing people. Our services can be availed in the cities surrounding Delhi as well such as Faridabad, Noida, Gurgaon, etc. Patient Care Services We have been a name to reckon with when it comes to offer comprehensive Patient care services. We are registered organization dedicated to the service of public health. We are provided the service to about 700 patients. Ambulance Service We provide Ambulance Services in Delhi/NCR for emergency medical situations. Maintaining high standards, we ensure that the Ambulance Services are provided 24X7 all throughout the day and night.

detailsOfAchievement: SHAMBU EDUCATION SOCIETY HARYANA SOCIETY VISION : TO USE EDUCATION AS A TOOL OF SOCIAL TRANSFORMATION AND TO SPREAD IT AMONGST THAT SECTION OF THE POPULACE DEPRIVED OF IT DURING THE PRECEDING CENTURIES AND TO EQUIP THEM TO PARTICIPATE IN THE NATION BUILDING ACTIVITY WITH A VIEW TO PROMOTE THEIR INDIVIDUAL, SOCIAL AND NATIONAL GROWTH. SOCIETY MISSION : TO BUILD A NETWORK OF SCHOOL AND COLLEGES FOR EDUCATING THE MASSES. TO UNDERTAKE RURAL DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMME FOR THE UPLIFTMENT OF VILLAGES AND THE RURAL AREAS WITH SUCH INSTRUMENTS LIKE THE RURAL DEVELOPMENT INSTITUTES AND ITS LIKE. TO ESTABLISH FARMERS ASSOCIATION FOR SAFEGUARDING THEIR INTERESTS AND FOR VENTILATING THEIR GRIEVANCES. TO DISSEMINATE THE LATEST KNOWLEDGE AND TECHNOLOGY IN FARMING, SO THAT THE PEOPLE OF THIS REGION ARE ALWAYS IN THE FLOW OF THE LATEST CURRENTS WORLDWIDE. TO UNDERTAKE EXCLUSIVE PROGRAMME FOR CASTE ERADICATION, SOCIAL REFORMATION AND FREEDOM FROM DEBT OF THE FARMERS AND PEASANTS. SOCIETY OBJECTS : SHAMBHU EDUCATION SOCIETY, PANIPAT HARYANA IN THE YEAR 2014 ESTABLISHMENT FOR SKILED BASED TRAINING INSTITUTE AND PVT ITI . CURRENTLY OPERATE SHMBHU PVT ITI MOHALI PANIPAT. TRADES INTAKE 280 SEATS. ELECTRICAL / FITTER /DIESEL MACHANIC. THE FOLLOWING PURPOSES: TO ESTABLISH, CONDUCT, MANAGE, SUPERVISE AND TAKE OVER EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS OF VARIOUS KINDS FOR BOYS, GIRLS AND ADULTS. SPECIALLY VOCATIONAL AND SKILL EDUCATION . TO PROVIDE FACILITIES FOR THE ACQUISITION OF KNOWLEDGE AND INFORMATION AND THE ADVANCEMENT OF CULTURE; TO UNDERTAKE MAKE AVAILABLE FACILITIES FOR RESEARCH IN ALL BRANCHES OF KNOWLEDGE AND TO ESTABLISH INSTITUTIONS FOR THE PURPOSE. TO CARRY ON EXPERIMENTS WITH A VIEW TO IMPROVING METHODS OF TEACHING AND TO ESTABLISHING INSTITUTIONS FOR THIS PURPOSE. TO ENCOURAGE PHYSICAL, CULTURE AND START CONDUCT OR MANAGE INSTITUTIONS FOR THIS PURPOSE. TO ENCOURAGE WOMENS EDUCATIONS BY ESTABLISHING SPECIAL INSTITUTIONS LIKE HOSTELS, WINDOWS HOMES AND NURSING SCHOOL, ETC. TO ESTABLISH HOSTELS FOR POOR BOYS AND GIRLS AND TO OPEN AND CONDUCT ORPHANAGES. TO DO EACH; EVERY AND ALL SUCH THINGS AS ARE INCIDENTAL OR HELPFUL OR CONDUCIVE TO THE ACCOMPLISHMENT, ATTAINMENT, AND FURTHERANCE OF THE ABOVE OBJECTS.

To educate the people about the animal diseases to make them aware about animals behavior so that animals can live a good long life;
